parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.label: Resource groups
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type in~ ({ResourceTypes})
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId, resourceGroup
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup), label = resourceGroup, selected = false

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query: resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.operationsmanagement/solutions' | where name contains 'SecurityInsights' | project id = tostring(properties.workspaceResourceId)

content.json:
This workbook contains various queries to help in performing a Sentinel GAP Analysis. It covers the following: - Data Visibility - Recommended logs that are synched to Sentinel - Noisy Alerts - Top firing alerts that have not been closed as True Positive - Log Ingestion - A summary of data ingestions by volume.

For more details refer to the [WA SOC Microsoft Sentinel Guidance](https://soc.cyber.wa.gov.au/onboarding/sentinel-guidance/) or contact WA SOC on cybersecurity@dpc.wa.gov.au

version control: v1.0 June 2024 --- ## Instructions: 1. Select Workspace (Default to all) 2. Define Time Range of search. 3. Contact cybersecurity@dpc.wa.gov.au for further enquiries on this workbook

# Sentinel Logging Visibility
---
## The table below shows logging visibility into Sentinel

(AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule" | where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog" | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Azure Diagnostics', TableR ='AzureDiagnostics(AzureIDS)', Results),

(AzureDiagnostics | where Category contains "SQL" | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Azure Diagnostics', TableR ='AzureDiagnostics(AzureSQL)', Results),
(AzureDiagnostics | where ResourceType in ("APPLICATIONGATEWAYS", "FRONTDOORS", "CDNWEBAPPLICATIONFIREWALLPOLICIES", "PROFILES") | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Azure Diagnostics', TableR ='AzureDiagnostics(AzureWAF)', Results),
(AzureDiagnostics| where Category == 'GatewayDiagnosticLog' | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Azure Diagnostics', TableR ='AzureDiagnostics(GatewayDiagnosticLog)', Results),
(CommonSecurityLog | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Common Event Format (CEF)', TableR ='CommonSecurityLog', Results),
(DeviceNetworkEvents | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Microsoft Defender', TableR ='DeviceNetworkEvents', Results),
(DnsEvents | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Windows DNS', TableR ='DnsEvents', Results),
(IntuneAuditLogs | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Microsoft Endpoint Manager(Intune)', TableR ='IntuneAuditLogs', Results),
(SecurityAlert | where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT" | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Microsoft Defender for IoT', TableR ='SecurityAlert(ASCforIoT)', Results),
(AWSCloudTrail | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Amazon Web Services', TableR ='AWSCloudTrail', Results)
| join kind=rightouter (mapping) on $left.['TableR'] == $right.['TableL']
| project Table=TableL, ['Data Connector'], Description, Synced= iff(Results==0 or isempty(Results), 0, 1), SyncedIcon= iff(Results==0 or isempty(Results),"❌", "✅")
| extend joined_=strcat(Table, " ", SyncedIcon)
| summarize ['Coverage(%)']= countif(Synced ==1)*1.00/count(), new =make_set(joined_) by Description
| extend ['Recommended Sentinel Tables'] = tostring(strcat_array(new,", "))
| project Description, ['Coverage(%)'], ['Recommended Sentinel Tables'] | order by Description asc

content.json:
## Recommended actions - Turn on [auditing and health monitoring](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/enable-monitoring)

- Use [the health monitoring workbook](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/monitor-data-connector-health#use-the-health-monitoring-workbook) to monitor the health of your data connectors

- [Connect the Azure Activity](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/audit-sentinel-data) data source to audit Sentinel activities

content.title: Last Asset Log Received - Heartbeat
Monitor the health of your data connectors - SentinelHealth
Activity by Resource Provider - AzureActivity

content.json:
## Recommended actions - Find more details about [Microsoft Entra ID](https://www.microsoft.com/en-au/security/business/identity-access/microsoft-entra-id)

- Sync the [OfficeActivity](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/data-connectors/microsoft-365) table (SharePoint, Exchange, Teams activity logs) into Sentinel

- Deploy [Microsoft Defender for Identity](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/defender-for-identity/deploy/quick-installation-guide)

content.query:
//User/Group/Entitlement Management
AuditLogs
| where Category == "UserManagement" or Category == "EntitlementManagement" or Category == "GroupManagement"
| summarize count() by OperationName
content.title: User/Group/Entitlement Management (Microsoft Entra ID) - Audit Logs

items.name: View User/Group/Entitlement Management (Microsoft Entra ID) - Audit Logs

content.query:
// Management Actions, Privilege Elevation (Privileged Identity Management)
AuditLogs
| where Identity == "MS-PIM"
| summarize count() by OperationName
content.title: Management Actions, Privilege Elevation (Privileged Identity Management) - AuditLogs

items.name: Management Actions, Privilege Elevation (Privileged Identity Management)

content.query:
// User/Group Changes
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "role" or OperationName contains "user" or OperationName contains "principal" or OperationName contains "member" or OperationName contains "group"
| where OperationName !contains "invite"
| where OperationName !contains "external"
| where OperationName !contains "licnense"
| summarize count() by OperationName , Identity, tostring(TargetResources[0].userPrincipalName)
content.title: User/Group Changes - AuditLogs

content.query:
// Content Filtering Policy Updates (Microsoft 365)
OfficeActivity
| where Operation contains "policy"
| where Operation !contains "access"
| summarize count() by RecordType, Operation
content.title: Content Filtering Policy Updates (Microsoft 365) - OfficeActivity

content.query:
// Exchange Logs (Microsoft 365)
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == "Exchange"
| project Operation, MailboxOwnerUPN, ClientIP
content.title: Exchange Logs (Microsoft 365) - OfficeActivity

content.query:
//Exchange Policy Changes (Microsoft 365)
OfficeActivity
| where RecordType == "ExchangeAdmin"
| where Operation contains "policy"
| where Operation !contains "access"
| summarize count() by Operation
content.title: Exchange Policy Changes (Microsoft 365) - OfficeActivity

content.query:
SecurityAlert 
| where ProductName == "Azure Advanced Threat Protection"
| summarize count() by AlertName
content.title: Azure Advanced Threat Protection - SecurityAlert (AATP)
Accessing Management CLI/Powershell Functions (Microsoft Entra ID) - SigninLogs

items.name: Accessing Management CLI/Powershell Functions (Microsoft Entra ID)

content.query:
// Admin Authentication (needs IdentityInfo)
IdentityInfo
| where AssignedRoles contains "Admin" or AssignedRoles contains "owner" or AssignedRoles contains "contributor"
| join (SigninLogs) on $left.AccountUPN == $right.UserPrincipalName
| summarize count() by AccountUPN, AppDisplayName
content.title: Admin Authentication - IdentityInfo/SigninLogs

content.json: ## Recommended actions - Enable [User and Entity Behavior Analytics (UEBA)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/enable-entity-behavior-analytics?tabs=azure) in Microsoft Sentinel

content.query:
// User Entity Behavior Analytics
BehaviorAnalytics
| where ActionType == "Sign-in"
| where (UsersInsights.NewAccount == True or UsersInsights.DormantAccount == True) and (ActivityInsights.FirstTimeUserAccessedResource == True and ActivityInsights.ResourceUncommonlyAccessedAmongPeers == True or ActivityInsights.FirstTimeUserUsedApp == True and ActivityInsights.AppUncommonlyUsedAmongPeers == False)
| join (SigninLogs | where Status.errorCode == 0 or Status.errorCode == 0 and RiskDetail != "none") on $left.SourceRecordId == $right._ItemId
| extend UserPrincipalName = iff(UserPrincipalName contains "#EXT#", replace("_", "@", tostring(split(UserPrincipalName, "#")[0])), UserPrincipalName), UserName = iff(UserName contains "#EXT#", replace("_", "@", tostring(split(UserPrincipalName, "#")[0])), UserName)
| extend AnomalyName = "Anomalous Successful Logon"
content.title: User Entity Behavior Analytics - BehaviorAnalytics

content.query:
// Privileged Roles/Groups (Microsoft Sentinel)
IdentityInfo 
| where GroupMembership contains "admin" or GroupMembership contains "contributor" or AssignedRoles contains "admin" or AssignedRoles contains "contributor"
| summarize count() by AccountUPN, tostring(GroupMembership)
content.title: Privileged Roles/Groups (Microsoft Sentinel) - IdentityInfo

content.query:
// Admin Sign Ins (Microsoft Entra ID)
IdentityInfo
| where AssignedRoles contains "Admin" or AssignedRoles contains "owner" or AssignedRoles contains "contributor"
| join (SigninLogs) on $left.AccountUPN == $right.UserPrincipalName
| extend Country = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
| where ResultType == 0
| project UserPrincipalName, AssignedRoles, Department, JobTitle, Country, TimeGenerated
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Admin Sign Ins (Microsoft Entra ID) - IdentityInfo

content.json:

*Tables:* [DeviceEvents](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/deviceevents), [DeviceFileEvents](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/devicefileevents) , [DeviceLogonEvents](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/devicelogonevents) , [DeviceNetworkInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/devicenetworkinfo) , [DeviceProcessEvents](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/deviceprocessevents) , [DeviceRegistryEvents](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/deviceregistryevents) - *DataConnector* [Azure Monitor]( https://azure.microsoft.com/services/monitor/)

content.json:
# Top Noisy Alerts 
---
### The table below depicts the top 5 firing SecurityIncidents with Severity of "Medium" or "High" that have triggered more than 60 times in the past month and have not been closed as a TruePositive

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentName
| where Severity has_any ("Medium", "High")
| where Classification != 'TruePositive'
| summarize count() by Title, Severity, ProviderName, TenantId
    | where count_ > 60
    | project Title, Severity, ProviderName, Count = count_
    | top 5 by Count desc

| where IsBillable == true
| where DataType contains "_CL"

let AzDiagTables = AzureDiagnostics
| summarize TotalIngestBytes=sum(_BilledSize) by Category
| project ['Log Type'] = "AzureDiagnostics", ['Table'] = Category ,['Table Size'] = TotalIngestBytes/1024000000;
let knownTables = Usage
| where IsBillable == true 
| where DataType <> "AzureDiagnostics"
| join kind=leftouter Categories on $left.DataType == $right.Type
| summarize size =sumif(Quantity, isnotempty(Category))/1024, sizeOther= sumif(Quantity,(isempty(Category) and DataType !contains "_CL"))/1024 by Category, DataType
| project ['Log Type'] = iif(isnotempty( Category),Category,"Other"), ['Table'] = DataType, ['Table Size'] = iif(isnotempty( Category),size ,sizeOther);
union customTables, knownTables, AzDiagTables
| sort by ['Table Size'] desc

content.json:
This workbook contains various queries to help in performing a Sentinel GAP Analysis. It covers the following: - Data Visibility - Recommended logs that are synched to Sentinel - Noisy Alerts - Top firing alerts that have not been closed as True Positive - Log Ingestion - A summary of data ingestions by volume.

For more details refer to the [WA SOC Microsoft Sentinel Guidance](https://soc.cyber.wa.gov.au/onboarding/sentinel-guidance/) or contact WA SOC on cybersecurity@dpc.wa.gov.au

version control: v1.0 June 2024 --- ## Instructions: 1. Select Workspace (Default to all) 2. Define Time Range of search. 3. Contact cybersecurity@dpc.wa.gov.au for further enquiries on this workbook

(AzureDiagnostics| where Category == 'GatewayDiagnosticLog' | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Azure Diagnostics', TableR ='AzureDiagnostics(GatewayDiagnosticLog)', Results),
(CommonSecurityLog | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Common Event Format (CEF)', TableR ='CommonSecurityLog', Results),

(DnsEvents | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Windows DNS', TableR ='DnsEvents', Results),
(IntuneAuditLogs | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Microsoft Endpoint Manager(Intune)', TableR ='IntuneAuditLogs', Results),
(SecurityAlert | where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT" | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Microsoft Defender for IoT', TableR ='SecurityAlert(ASCforIoT)', Results),
(AWSCloudTrail | limit 1 | summarize count() | extend Results = iff(count_ ==0, 0, 1) | project ['Connector'] = 'Amazon Web Services', TableR ='AWSCloudTrail', Results)
| join kind=rightouter (mapping) on $left.['TableR'] == $right.['TableL']
| project Table=TableL, ['Data Connector'], Description, Synced= iff(Results==0 or isempty(Results), 0, 1), SyncedIcon= iff(Results==0 or isempty(Results),"❌", "✅")
| extend joined_=strcat(Table, " ", SyncedIcon)
| summarize ['Coverage(%)']= countif(Synced ==1)*1.00/count(), new =make_set(joined_) by Description
| extend ['Recommended Sentinel Tables'] = tostring(strcat_array(new,", "))
| project Description, ['Coverage(%)'], ['Recommended Sentinel Tables'] | order by Description asc

content.query:
// User/Group Changes
AuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "role" or OperationName contains "user" or OperationName contains "principal" or OperationName contains "member" or OperationName contains "group"
| where OperationName !contains "invite"
| where OperationName !contains "external"
| where OperationName !contains "licnense"
| summarize count() by OperationName , Identity, tostring(TargetResources[0].userPrincipalName)

content.query:
// Admin Authentication (needs IdentityInfo)
IdentityInfo
| where AssignedRoles contains "Admin" or AssignedRoles contains "owner" or AssignedRoles contains "contributor"
| join (SigninLogs) on $left.AccountUPN == $right.UserPrincipalName
| summarize count() by AccountUPN, AppDisplayName
content.title: Admin Authentication - IdentityInfo/SigninLogs

content.json: ## Recommended actions - Enable [User and Entity Behavior Analytics (UEBA)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/enable-entity-behavior-analytics?tabs=azure) in Microsoft Sentinel

content.query:
// User Entity Behavior Analytics
BehaviorAnalytics
| where ActionType == "Sign-in"
| where (UsersInsights.NewAccount == True or UsersInsights.DormantAccount == True) and (ActivityInsights.FirstTimeUserAccessedResource == True and ActivityInsights.ResourceUncommonlyAccessedAmongPeers == True or ActivityInsights.FirstTimeUserUsedApp == True and ActivityInsights.AppUncommonlyUsedAmongPeers == False)
| join (SigninLogs | where Status.errorCode == 0 or Status.errorCode == 0 and RiskDetail != "none") on $left.SourceRecordId == $right._ItemId
| extend UserPrincipalName = iff(UserPrincipalName contains "#EXT#", replace("_", "@", tostring(split(UserPrincipalName, "#")[0])), UserPrincipalName), UserName = iff(UserName contains "#EXT#", replace("_", "@", tostring(split(UserPrincipalName, "#")[0])), UserName)
| extend AnomalyName = "Anomalous Successful Logon"
content.title: User Entity Behavior Analytics - BehaviorAnalytics

content.query:
// Privileged Roles/Groups (Microsoft Sentinel)
IdentityInfo 
| where GroupMembership contains "admin" or GroupMembership contains "contributor" or AssignedRoles contains "admin" or AssignedRoles contains "contributor"
| summarize count() by AccountUPN, tostring(GroupMembership)
content.title: Privileged Roles/Groups (Microsoft Sentinel) - IdentityInfo

content.query:
// Admin Sign Ins (Microsoft Entra ID)
IdentityInfo
| where AssignedRoles contains "Admin" or AssignedRoles contains "owner" or AssignedRoles contains "contributor"
| join (SigninLogs) on $left.AccountUPN == $right.UserPrincipalName
| extend Country = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
| where ResultType == 0
| project UserPrincipalName, AssignedRoles, Department, JobTitle, Country, TimeGenerated
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Admin Sign Ins (Microsoft Entra ID) - IdentityInfo

# Top Noisy Alerts 
---
### The table below depicts the top 5 firing SecurityIncidents with Severity of "Medium" or "High" that have triggered more than 60 times in the past month and have not been closed as a TruePositive

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentName
| where Severity has_any ("Medium", "High")
| where Classification != 'TruePositive'
| summarize count() by Title, Severity, ProviderName, TenantId
    | where count_ > 60
    | project Title, Severity, ProviderName, Count = count_
    | top 5 by Count desc

let customTables = Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| where DataType contains "_CL"
| summarize size = sum(Quantity)/1024 by DataType
| project ['Log Type'] = "Custom Log",['Table'] = DataType, ['Table Size'] = size;
let AzDiagTables = AzureDiagnostics
| summarize TotalIngestBytes=sum(_BilledSize) by Category
| project ['Log Type'] = "AzureDiagnostics", ['Table'] = Category ,['Table Size'] = TotalIngestBytes/1024000000;
let knownTables = Usage
| where IsBillable == true 
| where DataType <> "AzureDiagnostics"
| join kind=leftouter Categories on $left.DataType == $right.Type
| summarize size =sumif(Quantity, isnotempty(Category))/1024, sizeOther= sumif(Quantity,(isempty(Category) and DataType !contains "_CL"))/1024 by Category, DataType
| project ['Log Type'] = iif(isnotempty( Category),Category,"Other"), ['Table'] = DataType, ['Table Size'] = iif(isnotempty( Category),size ,sizeOther);
union customTables, knownTables, AzDiagTables
| sort by ['Table Size'] desc
